articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The retail giant is still struggling to get its services back up and running following a cyber attack.
articles.title: M&S cyber attack: Customer data stolen, company confirms

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A husband said he wanted a chat, then confessed to his wife he had been spiking her drinks and raping her.
articles.title: 'I was drugged and raped by my husband for years'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The French actor, who denies the allegations, has been given a suspended jail term of 18 months.
articles.title: Gérard Depardieu found guilty of sexual assault in Paris trial

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The planned layoffs mean the Japanese carmaker has now cut about 15% of its workforce in the past year.
articles.title: Nissan to cut 11,000 more jobs and shut seven factories

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Metropolitan Police arrest a 21-year-old man on suspicion of arson with intent to endanger life after fires at homes linked to the prime minister.
articles.title: Keir Starmer: Man arrested after fires at homes linked to prime minister

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The victim of an assault just days before the tree felling says the men were in the police's sights.
articles.title: Sycamore Gap pair were investigated over homophobic attacks

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Yorkshire Water issues "boil orders" for High Bentham, Low Bentham and Burton in Lonsdale.
articles.title: North Yorkshire 'boil tap water' alert after bacteria discovered

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Yuval Raphael, who survived the 7 October attack, says performing her ballad New Day Will Rise is a "personal win".
articles.title: Yuval Raphael: Israel's Eurovision entry says she has practised being booed

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Heather Peace says she had surgery and chemotherapy after being diagnosed with breast cancer last year.
articles.title: Heather Peace: EastEnders star reveals cancer treatment

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The King and Queen will host the president and his wife Brigitte Macron at Windsor Castle.
articles.title: French President Emmanuel Macron to visit UK for state visit in July
